settings.content: Preorders will start soon, subscribe here to be informed of the launch

SYE [Start Your Engine] is a premium brand bringing the concept of Sport Tailoring to your wrist.
With its fine leather, impeccable finish, exclusive style and sharp design, you have so many reasons to get excited and give in to temptation.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Keep up with the launch!

settings.title: Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.title: START YOUR ENGINE
settings.content:
Qu’avez-vous ressenti devant les courbes d’une carrosserie d’exception, la musique sauvage d’un bicylindre, l’éclat d’un chrome rutilant, le toucher sensuel d’une sellerie patinée par les ans ?

Ce sont toutes ces émotions qui m’animent et ont guidé la création de la marque SYE !

A la recherche d’un temps idéal, elles m’ont inspiré et conduit à réinterpréter les matières, le savoir-faire et l’esprit du design du XXème siècle dans une montre résolument moderne.

Sir Yorrick Earl

settings.title: INVENTER
settings.subtitle: une nouvelle élégance
settings.content:
Anti-conformiste, assumé, distingué… SYE inaugure le Sport Tailoring au poignet : alliance de rigueur et de décontraction, d’exigence et de liberté.

Porter une SYE, c’est affirmer son attachement à une montre différente, revendiquer un style musclé et un esprit audacieux.

settings.title: PROVOQUER
settings.subtitle: des sensations fortes
settings.content:
Embarquez, osez et laissez vos sens s’emballer !

Pour nos montres, pas de compromis : de belles matières, des finitions impeccables, un style exclusif et un design vraiment cool.

Autant de raisons de vibrer fort et de céder à la tentation !

settings.title: EVERYONE
settings.subtitle: is a winner!
settings.content:
After two years of development, SYE watches are finally ready to go... but now they need your help.

To breathe life into our first watches and get our machines rolling, SYE is opening up pre-orders and you have everything to gain!

settings.html_area: <iframe width="100%" height="500" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YIBqB-N2B38?autoplay=1controls=0&start=22?autoplay=1" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
settings.block_text-1:
Our desire to design an exclusive watch led to the birth of MOT1ON.


MOT1ON combines a high-quality leather strap with a modern steel body in an innovative, eye-catching design.


This watch is the epitome of Sports Tailoring for your wrist; it's as dynamic as it is elegant and will hug your wrist all day long without a single misstep.


If you want to change up your style, the Fastback™ system and our range of premium straps makes swapping out the strap so simple.
settings.block_text-2:
We cut no corners with MOTION – it has the best of everything.

A solid steel body, an impeccably precise finish and an anodized screw in the middle for an unexpected touch.

The strap – made of only the finest leather – is interspersed with metal and comes with a folding clasp to make wearing it easier and more secure.

At the heart of the SYE MOTION watches, we chose to use famously reliable Japanese movements. We offer an automatic movement, powered by the motion of your wrist, and a mechanical-quartz hybrid movement to combine the ultra-precise quartz with the familiar mechanical tick.

Underneath the MOTION watch you will find the Fastback™ system, an ingenious mechanism that makes swapping out the strap feel like playing with Meccano.

settings.block_text-1:
We stopped at nothing to make the best possible straps for SYE MOTION watches.

The straps are made from French calfskin, carefully chosen from a tannery in Alsace. Its quality is unparalleled – soft, supple, and able to acquire a beautiful patina over time.

This leather is lined with a semi-matte full grain calfskin with our signature color, which matches the back of the watch perfectly.
settings.html_area2: <iframe width="100%" height="500" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YIBqB-N2B38?controls=0&autoplay=1&showinfo=0&iv_load_policy=3" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
settings.block_text-2:
The Fastback™ strap is a key part of the watch that required several long months of development to be truly perfected.

Original, with crisp lines and precisely set into the watch, the Fastback™ strap is the pièce de résistance that makes the SYE MOTION watch so exclusive.

Our straps are produced by a top-range French producer based in the eastern Doubs region. They are meticulously crafted and checked in order to be precise and supple with high-quality finishes and stitching.

settings.title: VENUE DETAILS
settings.address:
Address :
33 rue Lafayette
75009 Paris

Accesses : Métro 7 : Le Peletier (a few steps away), Métro 12 : Notre-Dame-de-Lorette (3 min walk), Métro 8/9 : Richelieu-Drouot (5 min walk)

settings.title: TOUCH & TRY MEETINGS
settings.subtitle: Exclusive pre-launch fitting sessions.
settings.content:
Welcome…

to our Paris lounge, where you can come and get to know the whole range of SYE watches and straps before the crowds.

Make yourself comfortable, and touch and try out our watches and straps. Slip them onto your wrist and feel everything they have to offer.

This is also the perfect chance to ask us any questions you might have about the watches.

If you're able to come to Paris, make the most of the opportunity and come and discover our products before the crowds!

The lounge is open on Fridays from 10am until 7pm.

settings.title: Start Your Engine
settings.subtitle: and keep up with the launch!

settings.title: EXCEPTIONAL PRICE
settings.content: You can get up to 40% off compared to future public prices. Snap them up fast!

settings.title: NUMBERED PRODUCTS
settings.content: The first 250 products will come with exclusive numbers. One time only!

settings.title: COMPLETELY SECURE AND FREE SHIPPING
settings.content: We're committed to shipping your watch anywhere in the world* for free or your money back.

settings.title: PROTOTYPES
settings.content: Our watches are the real deal. Stopping by Paris soon? Come and try one out!

settings.title: PRE-ORDER
settings.content: You have limited time to make your choice, but so many advantages when you do.

settings.title: PRODUCTION
settings.content: Ready, set, go! Our workshops are now working hard to produce, assemble and check your watch.

settings.title: SHIPPING
settings.content: Free, secure, tracked international shipping – we take care of everything.

settings.title: YOUR FEEDBACK
settings.content: We'll be excited to hear about what you think of your new watch.

settings.title: SYE'S COMMITMENTS
settings.subtitle: We will constantly keep you informed throughout the development of your watch.

settings.title: UNE FORTE PERSONNALITE
settings.content:
Après 2 ans de développement, SYE dévoile ses produits.

Mais ce projet, très abouti, ne pourra vraiment démarrer que grâce à vous.

Pour donner vie aux premières montres SYE, la marque lance une pré-commande et vous avez tout à y gagner !

settings.subheading: Change your strap like a charm.
settings.title: FASTBACK™ SYSTEM
IMAGINE...
settings.subtitle: AN INGENIOUS SYSTEM TO JOIN THEM

settings.title: CASE
settings.text:

settings.title: A STRONG PERSONALITY
settings.content:
Our desire to design an exclusive watch led to the birth of MOT1ON.
MOTION Automatic 24 combines a top-range leather strap with a modern steel body in an innovative, eye-catching design.
Its rich personality brings Sports Tailoring your wrist; it's as dynamic as it is classy, as elegant as it is athletic, and it will hug your wrist all day long without a single misstep.
If you want to change up your style, be our guest! Through its Fastback™ system and our range of premium straps, swapping out the strap is so simple.

settings.title: WELL CRAFTED
settings.content:
We cut no corners with MOT1ON – it is simply the best.
We started with a solid 316L stainless steel body with an impeccable finish, carefully balancing between brushed steel around the body, polished steel for the bezel and a sophisticated bead-blasted finish on the back... not to mention the anodized screw in the middle for an unexpected touch of colour.
The dial is protected by a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal with an anti-reflective coating. This means you have nothing worry about when admiring the many details of the elegant dial.
The same principle was applied to the strap – no corners cut, simply the best.
We selected high-end leathers from famous French and European tanneries, and the straps are crafted with the utmost care by our French partner which carries the Entreprise du patrimoine vivant label, awarded to businesses demonstrating excellence and traditional savoir-faire.
The folding clasp holds MOT1ON on your wrist and makes wearing it easier and more secure.

settings.title: PERFECT FOR GEARHEADS
settings.content:
The mood is immediately set with etched lines like an engine block.
At the heart of your SYE MOT1ON Automatic 24, we chose to use the reliable Miyota Japanese watch movement, which beats 21,600 times per hour (3 Hz). This mechanical watch movement is automatically powered via the motion of your wrist and will reserve its power for over 42 hours off your wrist.
Underneath the MOTION watch you will find the Fastback™ system, which is an ingenious mechanism allowing you to swap out straps with ease. With a few simple twists of a screwdriver, you can remove the back, change the strap, and you're good to go!
There's no doubt that MOTION watches will bring out your inner mechanic.

settings.title: BE THE FIRST TO GET YOUR SYE MOT1ON!
A STRONG PERSONALITY
settings.content:
Our desire to design an exclusive watch led to the birth of MOT1ON.

MOTION Chronograph combines a top-range leather strap with a modern steel body in an innovative, eye-catching design.

Its rich personality brings Sports Tailoring your wrist; it's as dynamic as it is classy, as elegant as it is athletic, and it will hug your wrist all day long without a single misstep.

settings.title: WELL SCULPTED
settings.content:
We cut no corners with MOT1ON – it is simply the best.

MOT1ON boasts a solid stainless steel 316L body made up of five mechanical components to fill it with sophistication and character.

Its impeccable finish is carefully balancing between brushed steel around the body, polished steel for the bezel and a sophisticated bead-blasted finish on the back... not to mention the anodized screw in the middle for an unexpected touch of colour.

The dial is protected by scratch-resistant sapphire crystal with an anti-reflective coating. This means you have nothing worry about when admiring the many details of the elegant dial.

settings.title: PERFECT FOR GEARHEADS
settings.content:
The mood is immediately set with etched lines like an engine block.

At the heart of your SYE MOT1ON Chronograph, we selected a mechanical-quartz hybrid movement from the Japanese brand Seiko TMI, renowned for its reliability and amazing precision with a frequency of 32 Hz. This unique watch movement combines precise quartz with the familiar mechanical tick. As for its lifespan, you should only need to replace the battery every three years.

Underneath the MOT1ON watch you will find the Fastback™ system, which is an ingenious mechanism allowing you to swap out straps with ease. With a few simple twists of a screwdriver, you can remove the back, change the strap, and you're good to go!
There's no doubt that MOT1ON watches will bring out your inner mechanic.

settings.title: CASE
settings.text:
Material: stainless steel 316L

Construction: 5-part case construction

Crystal: scratch-resistant & AR coated sapphire

Caseback: Fastback™ system

Water resistance: 50M (5 ATM)

settings.title: DIAL
settings.text:
Colors: Silver or Smoky grey brushed steel dial

Functions: hour, minute, date, central 1/5s chrono, 60 minutes & 24h hours sub-dials 

Hands : diamond shape with SuperLuminova® coating

settings.title: MOVEMENT
settings.text:
Type: mechanical-quartz movement

Caliber: Seiko / TMI VK64

Frequency: 32 Hz

Power reserve: 3 years (approx. battery life)

settings.title: DIMENSIONS
settings.text:
Diameter: 40,5mm

Width (incl. crown): 43,5mm 

Thickness: 13,4 mm

Weight : 100g (3,53 oz) approx.

settings.title: STRAP
settings.text:
Fastback™ Premium strap among 10 variations

Lining: full grain Italian calf in SYE blue

Stitching: contrasting stitches

Buckle: brushed stainless steel deployment buckle

Length: 120/80mm (long/short strap)

settings.title: EXTRAS
settings.text:
Content of the box: SYE MOT1ON Chronograph watch + premium Fastback™ strap + deployment buckle + Fastback™ tool

Warranty: 2 years

Special: exclusive numbered pre-order limited to 500 units

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer: We always aim for make sure our customers love our products, but if you do need to return an order, we’re happy to help. Just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process.

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.answer: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.text:
How did you feel the first time you saw the smooth curves of a classy car, heard the musical growl of a twin engine, glimpsed a flash of gleaming chrome or felt the sensual touch of an aged leather seat?

These are the feelings that drive us and that led to the creation of SYE!

In our quest for a perfect moment, they inspired us look at materials, savoir-faire and 20th century design principles from a new angle in an unashamedly modern watch.

Non-conformist, self-assured, distinguished – SYE brings the concept of Sports Tailoring to your wrist through a perfect marriage of rigorous yet relaxed, demanding yet free.

Wearing a SYE watch means proclaiming your attachment to a different kind of watch and putting your strong style and bold mindset on display.

Get on board, take the plunge and let your senses take off!

We cut no corners in our watches, using only the finest materials, an impeccable finish, exclusive styles and exciting designs...

So many reasons to get excited and give in to temptation!

An unadultered good time.

Get ready for an exclusive experience.

We promise you'll love it!

settings.subheading: Maybe the most sophisticated strap in the world
settings.title: PREMIUM FASTBACK™ STRAP
settings.content:
Taking its name from the dynamic shape of renowned carriages, the premium Fastback™ range that adorns each SYE MOT1ON watch is made primarily of French calfskin. Carefully chosen from a tannery in Alsace, it has unparalleled quality: soft, supple and able to acquire a beautiful patina over time.

Our esteemed French producer carries the 'Entreprise du patrimoine vivant' label and meticulously crafts the straps with a high-quality finish to ensure they fit your wrist perfectly.
We have taken every step to make sure your strap stays with you as long as possible - metal inserts seamlessly incorporated into the leather increase longevity and perfectly sync with the watch body. A folding deployment buckle maintains your strap’s shape and protects it from marks.

The premium Fastback™ straps create an unmatched tailored style in a wide choice of 10 colors and leather finishes to ensure your watch is personalized just for you

settings.title: BE THE FIRST TO WEAR A SYE MOT1ON WATCH!
BEAUTIFUL, HIGH-END LEATHER
settings.content:
We cut no corners when creating the Fastback™ straps for SYE MOT1ON watches – they are simply the best.

The straps are made primarly from French calfskin of unparalleled quality, carefully chosen from a tannery in Alsace. The end result is a soft, supple leather able to acquire a beautiful patina over time.

The leather is lined with a semi-matte calfskin with our signature color, which matches the back of the watch perfectly.

settings.title: BEAUTIFUL STRAP WITH A LONG LIFE
settings.content:
We have taken every step to make sure your Fastback™ strap stays with you as long as possible.Metal inserts are seamlessly incorporated into the leather to increase the longevity and perfectly sync with the watch case.

The quick change strip integrated helps you swap out your deployment buckle without any tool and move it to another Fastback™ strap.

settings.title: SPORT TAILORING ON YOUR WRIST
settings.content:
Original, with crisp lines and precisely set into the watch, the Fastback™ strap is the pièce de résistance that makes the SYE MOT1ON watch so exclusive.

Our Fastback™ straps are produced by a top-range French producer carrying the "Entreprise du patrimoine vivant" label. They are meticulously crafted with a high-quality finish to ensure they fit your wrist perfectly.

The Fastback™ Premium straps create an unmatched tailored style in a wide choice of 10 colors and leather finishes to ensure your watch is personalized for you.

settings.title: Title
settings.content: Add your own custom content to give more information about your store, availability details...

Fastback™  Premium strap among 10 variations

Leather origin: see product picture

Lining: SYE blue signature full grain leather

Stitching: contrasting

settings.title: DIMENSIONS
settings.text:

Length: 120 x 80 mm

Adjustment levels: 9

Weight: 20g approx.

settings.title: EXTRAS

Integrated quick change strip to for buckle swap without any tool

settings.title: SPECIFICATION SHEET (ENGLISH)
settings.text: Download the Fastback™  Premium straps product sheets in English

settings.title: SPECIFICATION SHEET (FRENCH)
settings.text: Download the Fastback™ Premium straps product sheets in French

settings.title: PREMIUM FASTBACK™ STRAP
settings.content:
Just like when putting on a pair of gloves, your palm will slip through the solid folding clasp made of brushed steel. Our signature semi-matte leather lining will rest against your wrist and you can fasten the clasp. You'll certainly make the most of your premium leather Fastback™ strap.
The straps are made from French calfskin of unparalleled quality, carefully chosen from a tannery in Alsace. The finish is achieved via a double tanning process before being milled with warm air. The end result is soft, supple leather able to acquire a beautiful patina over time.
To breathe life into our high-end leather, we have our Fastback™ straps produced by a top-range French producer, based in the eastern Doubs region and carrying the Entreprise du patrimoine vivant label. The straps are meticulously crafted and checked in order to be precise and supple with high-quality finishes and stitching. By choosing to work with this partner, we do everything we can to make sure your strap fits your wrist perfectly.
We planned everything to make sure your strap stays with you as long as possible – metal inserts in the leather to make it last longer and match perfectly with the watch body, and a folding clasp to maintain your strap's shape and protect it from marks.
All that's left for you to do is enjoy the beautiful, high-end leather on your Fastback strap.

Its rich personality brings 'Sport Tailoring' to your wrist; it's as dynamic as it is classy, as elegant as it is athletic, and it will hug your wrist all day long without a single misstep.
